mapper.insert: INSERT INTO claim(claimNum, subject, content, hitCount, mId, category) VALUES (claim_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hitCount}, #{mId}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM claim b JOIN member m ON b.mId=m.mId
SELECT claimNum, b.mId, subject, content ,hitCount, b.created FROM claim b JOIN member m ON b.mId=m.mId WHERE claimNum = #{claimNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE claim SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE claimNum = #{claimNum}
